derivation: from G1 (ἄδικος) (as a negative particle) and G1349 (ἄδικος);
strongs_def: unjust; by extension wicked; by implication, treacherous; specially, heathen
outline:
1. descriptive of one who violates or has violated justice
    1. unjust
    2. unrighteous, sinful
    3. of one who deals fraudulently with others, deceitful
